pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Godot is a IDE for building video games capable of making 3D and 2D games in a day. For scripting, it supports a python like scripting language called GDScript. It also supports C/C++, C# 7.0, visual programming. It has a built in 3D level editor, object manager.
For Android support: ANDROID_NDK_ROOT must be set as a per-package environmental variable. EGODOT_ANDROID_ARCHES must be set a per-package environmental variable and must include arm64v8. Support for android arch for the corresponding version are 2.1: armv6, armv7, arm64v8, x86, x86_64. 3.1: armv7, arm64v8, x86, x86_64
The ebuild allows to fine tune or shrink the internal dependencies of the export template as a per-package environmental variable. These clear the USE flags config options. Only javascript and android env vars are offered. Options must be space separated.
Example. EGODOT_ANDROID_CONFIG="module_opensimplex_enabled=True" EGODOT_JAVASCRIPT_CONFIG="module_opensimplex_enabled=True"
Example: Contents of /etc/portage/env/godot.conf: EGODOT_ANDROID_ARCHES="x86 x86_64 armv7 arm64v8"
Contents of /etc/portage/package.env: dev-games/godot godot.conf
